scripts.build: yarn run build:clean && yarn run build:tailwind && yarn run build:layout
scripts.build:tailwind: NODE_ENV=production tailwindcss build src/styles.css -o style.css -c tailwind.config.js
scripts.build:layout: NODE_ENV=production microbundle src/*.js -f cjs -o dist --no-sourcemap --jsx React.createElement --target node
scripts.dev:layout: microbundle watch src/*.js -f cjs -o dist --no-sourcemap --jsx React.createElement --target node
